target: It was my pleasure, enjoy the rest of your day.
context: <user> I'd like to find hotels in the cheap price range that offer free wifi. <system> There is one hotel that matches your search. It is the cambridge belfry in the west area. Can I book that for you? <user> No thank you, just the address and phone number please. <system> They are located on back lane, cambourne. Is there anything else I can help you with? <user> Can you book it for me. 3 people, 4 nights, Sunday. Reference number, please. <system> Booking was successful.Reference number is : 1CU5LU5X . is there anything else i can help? <user> Thanks. I am also looking for a place to eat in the north. Same price range as my hotel. <system> There are 2 choices - would you prefer indian or Italian food?<user> I would prefer italian. <system> da vinci pizzeria serves italian food it is in the north of town<user> OK, I will need to make a reservation for the same group of people at 12:45 on that same day. <system> You're all set. Your Reference number is : 7J5INWLY . Can I assist you with anything else?<user> Great. Thank you for your help. <system>
